text: Pilibacter is a genus of bacteria of the Enterococcaceae. This genus contains a single species, Pilibacter termitis, strains of which were isolated from a termite (Coptotermes formosanus Shiraki). Bacteria in this genus have been found in the respiratory tracts of human patients with pulmonary tuberculosis. == References == ==External links== * LPSN entry for Pilibacter Category:Bacteria genera Category:Lactobacillales Category:Gram-positive bacteria Category:Monotypic bacteria genera
title: Pilibacter
